text:
Beberapa waktu lalu aku reunian dengan teman lama yg tinggal di Aceh. Selain reuni temanku ini juga kangen mau belanja ke pasar tanah Abang. Maka aku carilah hotel yg strategis dan dekat dengan Tanah Abang. Aku memilih Bluesky selain strategis harga kamarnya tidak terlalu mahal.  Karena memang agenda kami byk jd bisa irit juga.

Setelah proses check in yg cepat kami langsung ke kamar menaruh koper. Kamar tipe deluxe ini cukup luas dan bersih. Ada meja kerja dan meja standard. AC dingin, air mineral, teh dan kopi. Aku memilih kamar dengan pemandangan kota Jakarta. Temanku seneng banget bisa melihat Jakarta dari atas. 

Kamar mandinya bersih meskipun bangunan lama. Tapi cukup terawat. Amenities lengkap. Air panas lancar dan yg penting air bekas mandi tidak menggenang. 

Pelayanan kamar dan front office sangat helpfull. Sopan dan ramah  Soalnya waktu aku minta tambahan handuk dan sendal langsung dianter. Kami juga sempat makan siang di restoran nya. Ternyata rame juga ya pas jam makan siang. Staff resto menawarkan makanan bernama mantao . Kami pun mencobanya dan ternyata enaaak banget. Bahkan chef nya langsung yang mengajarkan cara makan mantao.

Setelah kenyang kami langsung berangkat ke Pasar Tanah Abang. Overall aku dan temenku suka nginep di sini. Kami baru tahu belakangan kalau hotel ini jadi hotel favorit para pebisnis.

owner_response.text:
Dear Fajara899, 

Warmest greetings from Blue Sky Hotel Petamburan!

Thank you very much for sharing such a lovely review about your recent stay at our hotel. Ultimately, your positive feedback on our comfy design hotel has tremendously motivated us to keep delivering warm service to our guests.

We are extremely disappointed that you have had to endure a challenging service experience with us and we do apologize on behalf of all the team management members. Having spoken to the team, we are committed to improve and ensure a repeat of this incident does not repeat itself. Re-training will be done to enhance our service culture to our guests and possibly a necessary overhaul of our product offerings to ensure we remain available to our guests at all times. 

We thank you again for the feedback as it is only feedback like yours will we be able to improve and reinvent our product and services. Thank you.
 
We look forward to welcoming you back to Blue Sky Petamburan in the near future

Sincerely yours,

Novia
Ast. Marketing Communications Manager

text:
Dapat nih hotel dr aplikasi online as ussual. Langsung aja keulasan yg gak nyamannya. So, first yang gak nyamanx di hotel ini adalah air conditionernya (AC), AC nya bisa dibilang lambat dinginx. Perlu wktu untuk kerasa biar dingin eventhough udah disetel ke yang paling dibawah suhunya. Thats the first thing that not comfy from this hotel.
Second, ketika breakfast untuk hari pertama dapat teguran karena pake baju singlet doang. Menurut aturan mereka katax gak boleh. Im okey with that n followed their rule. Tapi yang bikin jengkelx pas hari kedua pagi berikutnya ternyata ada dua orang yg pake baju singlet lagi which is itu gak diperbolehkan, so i complain to them about it. Tapi ternyata ama mereka, mereka gak bisa memaksa kedua orang itu untuk ganti baju karena dua orang itu menolak. The problem is kalo memang pihak hotel gak bisa konsisten dalam menarapkan aturan maka ada baiknya mereka mereview lagi aturan tersebut yg menurut aku pribadi gak penting.
Third, ketika check out ternyata minuman aqua botol besar yg ditaruh di dalam kamar dan dua minuman soft drink yg mereka sediain dikamar dikenain charge ama mereka. They call it aku ngambil minuman dr mini barnya mereka. Its oke untuk pembayarannya, cmn kayaknya i got tricked by them. Cara penjualan yg tidak transparan. If they say di awal bahwa minuman yg di dalam itu adalah bagian dr mini barnya mereka yg buat aku sendiri not look like that, maka mungkin i will more careful to take it. 
So untuk yg ada rencana buat nginap di blue sky hotel hopely u guys will be more careful or pay attention with their regulation. Ini ulasan untuk ngejaga jangan sampai ada lagi yg kecele ama mini barnya mereka or harus not comfy dgn aturan baju yg harus dipakai pada saat breakfast.
Thanks for reading.

text: Blue Sky Hotel Petamburan adalah hotel bintang 3 yang terletak disalah satu pusat keramaian kota Jakarta. text: Saya mengetahui hotel ini atas rekomendasi teman sekantor yang pernah kerja di kantor pusat.  Hotel ini dekat sekali dengan kantor pusat saya di kawasan gerbang pemuda senayan dan Jakarta Convention Center tempat aktivitas saya selama di Jakarta.  Hotel ini juga dekat dari gambir maupun grand indonesia.  Hanya butuh waktu 10 sampe 15 menit menuju ke JCC.  Dari sisi desain saya rasa hotel ini antimainstream.  Pintu masuk berada di samping dan lobby berada di dalam.  Kamarnya luas dan nyaman. Receptionist ramah bahkan ketika mereka melayani telepon booking juga dibantu dengan ramah. Kebersihan kamar dan kamar mandi baik.  Hanya saja room service suka lupa meletakkan handuk maupun keset setelah membersihkan kamar.  Mereka juga menghargai privasi tamu dengan tidak memindahkan barang apapun dari tempatnya.  Susunan barang barang saya juga masih sama seperti saat saya meninggalkan kamar di pagi hari.  Staff lain juga sangat membantu kita. Saya tinggal cukup lama yakni hampir 1 minggu di hotel ini,  jadi saya bisa merasakan variasi masakan saat breakfaat.  Menu yang ditawarkan juga variatif.  Satu catatan saya adalah tempat order omelet yang tak terlihat.  Mungkin bisa ditambahkan dengan tulisan omelet station dan sejenisnya.  Overall saya senang menginap disini dan akan memasukkan hotel ini dalam bucket list tempat tinggal saya selama di jakarta.

Saya sudah beberapa kali menginap di Blue Sky ini. Hotel ini merupakan opsi terbaik jika Anda membutuhkan akomodasi untuk daerah sekitar Slipi dan Senayan, dan hotel-hotel lain di sekitar sudah penuh.

Hotel ini memang tidak terlalu besar, dengan lahan yang memang tidak luas. Sehingga kamar-kamar dibuat rapat, lorong tidak terlalu lebar dan tidak terlalu banyak ruangan/patio yang tidak ada fungsinya. 

Kamar yang tidak terlalu luas, namun didesain dengan compact sehingga membuat nyaman orang yang menginap. Kamar mandipun tidak terlalu luas, namun lengkap dengan jemuran handuk dan wastafel. 

Saya sangat menyukai desain kolam renang dan tempat fitnessnya yang memang memanfaatkan lahan yang terbatas, dan memaksimalkan fungsinya. Cerdas. Memang kolam renang ini berkaca transparan di dinding kolamnya sehingga bisa terlihat jelas dari lobby, namun pihak hotel tidak membatasi penggunaannya, sehingga kita bisa memilih menggunakan kolam renang tersebut pada jam-jam yang sepi.

It's a great strategic hotel in Jakarta. Located in town and also has various accesses to get there. The hotel is nice and comfy. Pleasure rest guaranteed. Facilities are good too, but the swimming pool not so big and I cancel my plan to swim since it is located in very front of reception desk with a huge window. So, if you're not embarassed bee seen by reception while swimming, it's okay, but not for me. So I choose to use fitness room instead. 
The hotel really clean and staff were friendly too. They are really helpful. I booked twin room since that is the only optio  available on agoda, but when I asked to change, they change it into queen bed room without any charge. Then they are strictly forbid smoking but they help me to get a room with window can be opened. They really helpful. 
The breakfast taste was good but it can be improved with variety of foods. 
Overall, it's a nice stay there.. I will choose this hotel again if I have business near slipi area.

text:
The hotel location is quite prime! It isn't located in a very busy street like S Parman, but definitely give us multiple options of route to anywhere.
We liked the breakfast they served because they had quite good variety of food. However coffee quality is definitely needs to improve.
Check in and our procedure wasn't complicated at all, but we didn't have a specific impression about the staff. They were generally pretty friendly and helpful.
The design of the room is quite lovely, spacious, and modern. We got everything we needed. And we thought the clear glass shower was very interesting concept. It's cool!
Because its closed to Santika Premiere, I have to compare a little bit because I've been there before. The price is higher in Santika but service, buffet breakfast, and pool were lot better. So I think it comes down to what is your priority and purpose of your visit. If you want to spend lots of time in the hotel then Santika is definitely worth the price. But if you are visiting for business and spend lots of time outside, Blue Sky is a great option with all amenities you need!
I hope Blue Sky will always keep up their good work! :-)

title: Much better than expected

text:
I stayed in this hotel for 5 days with my family. We stayed during Eid Fitr Holiday. 
The first time we get in there, I can see that this hotel has few parking lot for cars. The basement used for motorcycle. When we get in there by car, the security greeted us with warm-friendly smile and showed us where we should park our car. My father didn't really like the small parking lot, and refused to park the car where the security showed us. But, the security told us to park where he showed us, with really really calm and friendly tone. After we park our car, the security greeted us one more time and welcomed us really nice and warm-hearted.

We also greeted by the concierge and she showed us where the lobby was. When we went to the lobby to check in, the staff was waiting for us. They greeted my mother and said that they waited for us since it's only us that haven't checked in yet. This is really nice since the staffs know how to be friend with their customers. 

Unfortunately, for all the 5 days we spent here, there is only 1 elevator in use. I didn't know what happened to the other elevator. Until we checked out, there is only one active. Fortunately, the customer is not really crowded, so it is not a serious problem. 
We stayed at room 308. Since the first day we stayed is D-1 Eid Al-Fitr, the night was really noisy and crowded. inside the room, we can heard clearly the sound of fireworks, the cars, takbiran, child laughing and etc. And it will continue with takbiran and dua until morning. For us muslim, is not really annoying since we also enjoying the atmosphere of Eid Mubarak. But for those who trying to search the quietness for sleeping, I recommend you not to stay during the big day Holiday. 

The room was really nice. for superior room, I think it's quiet spacious. First, there is no cupboard, but a space with some hanger for clothes. the space is high so the clothes did not hit the floor and the safe-deposit box. The safe-deposit box worked good. The bathroom is nice. the toilet was so clean, and the shower got hot very quickly. And the most important, the bathroom was really, really clean. You don't have to be afraid that the bathroom will get flooded when you were showering since the glass-sliding door worked perfectly to avoid the water getting out to the outside. The bathroom looks huge because they separate the washing stand with the bathroom. The amenities is complete for 3 stars hotel. comb, cotton bud, shampoo, bath foam, tooth brush, shower cap, hair dryer, tea and coffee maker. And they give new amenities every day. Cool.

the bed was a little bit hard, but the pillow really, really soft and big. They also provide free extra pillow inside the room, above the space-cupboard. The small table was fitted for doing business such as writing, place for laptop. There are reading lamp besides the bed. The room was really spacious, there's enough space for us to pray. For muslim, there is also musholla at 2nd floor. But unfortunately, the room wasn't sound-proof. we can hear footsteps and children playing from the room besides us. It's a little annoying, so I recommend you not to stay here if you want some quietness night. 

The swimming pool was really small, and also the gym. I amused by the way they placed the gym above the swimming pool. it was really nice. We check out early and even after we get out from the hotel, all the staffs greeted us and gave us warm smile as we went by. At first thought, maybe the quality of this hotel was great since, I don't know, maybe the hotel was new? But from then on, keep up the great job and the friendly staffs!
title: Friendly Staff and Nice Hotel

text:
Service is superb, all staffs are friendly and attentive. You will have no problem hailing a cab as securities are super quick in getting one for you. 

Breakfast is nice for a small hotel. Love the tiles and decorations in the breakfast area.

However, you definitely need a pair of earplugs for your beauty sleep as the room is not soundproof. Whatever activities or conversations in the hallway can be heard loud and clear from your bed. Oh and sometimes the noise from the road too. All the honks and music from mikrolet sound-system. I stayed for 3 nights and left the hotel feeling tired for having lack of sleep every single night.

You may need extra room card to keep the ac running as the room can get super hot when you are away. 

This hotel is good for business travelers, it is strategic and not too pricey. Just do not forget to bring your earplugs with you. E a r p l u g s ! :)
title: Earplug is a must

text:
This hotel wasn't bad. Prime location, plenty of parking and not that expensive for a staycation. No check-in problem, free wi-fi, and small but nice pool for children. Rooms are spacious and beds are comfortable.

Trouble comes with their open corridor and the fact that their doors aren't noise proof. While it would be no trouble if the low-class residential area located right behind the hotel has no all-night dangdut music party with loud enough sound system, apparently it wasn't the case for me. Got a room on the 3rd floor, closer to the back of the hotel, it was annoying to hear the music all night. If you do stay at this hotel, make sure you ask for higher floor or rooms further away from the residential area.

While it wasn't the hotel's fault that their "neighbors" decided to sing, they shouldn't go with open-aired corridor (just so they don't have to put AC outside) or at least put a thick enough door to block the music. What disappointed me was that if you're an Indonesian developer, this kind of situation is predictable when you built a hotel near a low-class residential area.

I called the operator twice with no answer and I called concierge just to find an automated "vacant number" response. I finally complained to the room service guy (the only number who answered the call) who apologized but couldn't help any further. The staffs are friendly and nice though. But it was late, my son was sleeping and asking for a room change was too much a hassle.

At least my son still slept soundly despite all the noise.
I didn't give a "terrible" because other than the horrible corridor and doors that are "forgotten" to be soundproofed, this hotel isn't that bad for the price.
title: Comfortable yet Super Noisy Room

text:
When I got there after dinner, I found this hotel peace and quiet in busy Jakarta so that was very comforting considering our tight business schedules that day. In the morning it turned into the usual busy Jakarta scene.
The location was not close to any interesting places except for some bigger hotels nearby. You need to get a cab or any other means of transport of your fancy to get to other areas.
The hotel was new when we stayed there, so the rooms and the decor looked really nice. The bed was big and comfortable, I really liked it. New concept of budget hotel that puts the sink outside the bathroom. Amenities were good. Another new thing is the wall of the bathroom facing the room that is not concrete but glass with curtains, well may be for parents to watch over their toddlers bathing lol. 
Breakfast was okay, not something to anticipate eagerly, but there were choices for your taste. The place was facing the road, so, that's a plus as you can watch people getting by. 
Another downside was that's a bit pricey for its type and the front office that could be more friendly like any other Indonesians and more responsive.
Despite all the cons, I still found staying at this hotel a nice experience.
title: Not disappointing

text:
++ service
Most staffmembers have a basic knowledge of English, they always smile with sincerity and make me feel comforatable and at home. They are eager to serve and always accomodating to any request.

++ Breakfast Buffet
Many mains and sides to choose from. Fresh and tasty. Food and juices selection rotates every morning! Better than expected.

++ Room Size
Superior Room wich is their cheapest is much much spaciour than expected! It is more than adequat for 2 persons. I see no reason to upgrade altho if their executive room wasn't so ridulously expensive i would most definetly upgrade to that.

++ Pool Area
The water quality is top notch however i do have serious objection to the early closing time at 21:00. I'd love to be able to use the pool before and after midnight. Closing time of 2:00 would be more conveniant.
No need to bring towel as they provide for it after you done swimming, great! Shower facilities next to pool area present for after swmming and/or fitness. 

+ Cleaning Service

Friendly cleaners however occasionally they do forget simple routine things such as replenish small somplimentary water bottles or even replace dirty glasses/mugs but it' not an annoyence just a very minor inconveniance to me but they way i see it it shouldn't be that difficult ar all.
I do have a problem tho with forgetting to clean the floor. That happens a bit too often and no i'm not going to call them for it because cleaning my room twice a day would be a bit over the top.
Also some cleaners are way to eager to clean my room as they will wake me up early in the morning and  rush me to open door by keep knocking on the door ... Really??

-- One staffmember was so slow getting out of the elevator prolly due to insecurity/shyness that when my girlfriend tried entering the elevator the doorz shut down very hard on her head, luckily i pulled her out before it closed. I did not show my anger to this poor guy nor did i report this to a supervisor as i did not want to put him in any trouble.

-- Wich brings me to my next point, i never experienced an elevator that did not have a security in measure to prevent this from happening in the first place. Serious safety hazzard in my opinion.

-- Room Interior Design
Looks nothing like the pictures. I thougt it would have a blue'ish design wit a romantic touch to it. Honoustly the room looks boring and too much dirty stains on the wallfor my liking.
The rest of the hotel is pretty much accurately depictex tho, stylish as well.
title: 3 Stars? More like 3,5!

text:
Having to return from a 10 days vacation to Turkey, our return date happened to fall into a new government policy due to the emergence of new variants, where initially a 3 days requirement then extended to a 10 days mandatory quarantine.. the group of 20 traveller was already felt frustrated having to endure an extended period of days than previously anticipated..

Having read through online reviews on the internet, we relied on the advice of our long-trusted travel agent, Mba Marcel (Enjoy Wisata) that among those other available quarantine facilities, Blue Sky Hotel in Petamburan has been recommended. 

Apart from the longer duration of quarantine stay, the serious cost implications had been other concerns as those other upscale hotels showing extravagant comfort and luxury, at the same time would not present a better economic deals, except this one: Blue Sky Hotel in Petamburan that remain the most affordable option to us, and those other travelers in the tour group later followed us to choose the quarantine stay here. Then we decided to enlist ourselves for quarantine stay at Blue Sky Hotel in Petamburan, their daily rates deems affordable therefore we took 2 rooms.

Our initial impression changed as we stepped into the hotel, the staff had been courteous, though many of us kept on thinking the 10-long-days having been stuck indoor that boredom and frustration would be unimaginable.

The service is very good.. fast response. The person in-charge at the F&B staff had been courteous and friendly (Ms. Kartika, when you stay here for quarantine, ask for her assistance). Her client service deems superb as she often check with the guests whether the provided meals/options on the menu would meet satisfaction. Should alternative meals being requested, the dining staff ensured their best efforts to facilitate as 10-days considered the importance to have a creative menu options.

Room's amenities and availability for bath towels and bedding sheets change have been a swift response at any given time. The same attentive support had been reflected by the housekeeping crew, equipped with proper PPE outfit, throughly cleaning all parts of the room with care and industry's standard of hygienic disinfection.

As we spent 2021-2022 new year's eve in quarantine, the hotel staff and service had provided us a special treats. It's the care and genuine efforts to make our stay as much comfortable as possible must be acknowledged with admiration.

One thing to note, that the mattress is comfortable and provide adequate back support, not too hard and not too soft, therefore waking up from a good sleep would not hurt my back.

Good support for those paying attention to spinal posture..

In overall, my 10 days quarantine stay has proved that Blue Sky Hotel in Petamburan succeeded to pass way over a 3 star hotel standard. We witnessed a really good service and I can say that all those positive reviews must be all true. While there are rooms for improvements, I personally highly recommending this both for short and longer stay term.
title: The satisfactory & affordable of 10 day quarantine stay in Jakarta

text:
As I’m writing this, 3 of my family members have completed their quarantine in this hotel in 3 different time periods, and I can say the level of satisfaction is consistently delightful.

1) Amazing Staff
All the staff was extremely friendly from the online receptionist, driver, room cleaners, even the security guards. Everyone is so warm and helpful.

2) Delicious and Extra Healthy Food 
I loved the food during my stay there. Even though it was 3 meals x 7 days, each time was a variation of a treat. Their meal is well balanced too between the carbs and the veggies & fruits.
But what’s really amazing is how prepared they were with my father. As he is diabetic and has cholesterol, he was unable to eat food with sugar and salt.  The hotel chef, Mr. Tomo went high and above and provided special meals for him. I’ve attached the meal they provided with this review. 

3) Work Conducive Environment 
Most of the other hotels at this price range would only have a long rectangular bench with a plastic chair. I actually chose this hotel because I needed a larger table to accommodate my laptop and second monitor. The chair they provide was also comfy. They even provided me with a LAN cable, zoom meetings and web dev went smooth as home. 

4) View
Amazing city view. I usually leave the windows open at night to enjoy the scenery. 

5) Safe Quarantine 
Even though it's a quarantine, I enjoy every day there. A cleaner comes every day in PPE suit to clean up the room and restock any condiments. Very polite and kind man, as with everyone. Very important needs (my father needed some meds to be delivered) can be arranged by the hotel after through sanitization. 

Overall
10/10 would recommend Blue Sky hotel to family, friends, and even work colleagues. Also, those who are suffering from diabetes, you’ll definitely want to stay for the food.

My best regards to the super friendly super helpful online operator Cindy who was always there for us and chef Tomo for cooking the delicious diabetes friendly food for my father. Thank you so much.
title: Affordable Hotel with World Class Hospitality

text:
Stayed in this hotel for 3 nights during Ramadhan month. This hotel is only a 3 star hotel. I got room 306 at first, but there was a leak in the AC. Technician came and repair it, but after 5 minutes, it started to leak again. After complaining, finalky got settled in room 316. The room itself is a small room, compare with the budget hotel room. The facility was very average, like a typical hotel. Nothing special in the room. However, the wifi and AC worked well. 

Since this was Ramadhan month, There is an iftar dinner everyday. The food offered is not very special. Although they provide stall for noodles and fried rice, the taste were so so. Also, when I booked the room via Agoda, I purchase the one with free iftar, but during Iftar I must paid additional 50.000 rupiah, since the hotel said I only entitled free tajil (appetizer) not a full iftar. But that was not an issue, and I didn’t mind it. 

However, after this experience, perhaps I won’t consider to stay in this hotel again. However, if you want just a place to stay, then this hotel is worth the money.
title: Average Hotel

text: Overall, the hotel is a great place to stay but I hope the management will look at ways to improve its service level. 1) Room service don't pick the phone fast enough - one day it took 20 mins until someone picked up the phone. On 23/11 there was no response from room service from 9.00 am to 9.30 am. 2) The hotel does not provide iron for customers to iron their clothes. Instead, it provides ironing service for a fee. This another section that needs major improvement. On day two I gave three lightly crumpled shirts to iron at 7.40am and the staff promised to return within 10 mins. After repeatedly calling room service and asking them to return at least one shirt so I that I can go for my meeting, the laundry finally returned one shirt I asked for at 8.20am, while I had booked my transport for 8.00am . I could have ironed the shirt myself in one minute. Subsequently, I gave my shirts three more times and each time I had to call room service to return my shirts.
title: Great hotel but have to improve service level

text:
The room was comfortable with quiet A/C.  The TV has clear foreign channels like CNN, CNBC, BBC. The swimming pool is right there across from the Reception desk which offers no privacy from the people passing by. The hotel is located in an area not too pleasant to walk around in because of the congestion.  Mind you, this is common in Jakarta which is crowded just about everywhere you go.
Breakfast has a good choice of Indonesian food but I found it too salty, in fact I had had to tell the waitress to tell the cook to take it easy on salt.  Western food is limited. I found the room service was too slow for what I ordered.
The best taxi in Jakarta (Blue Bird) is readily available at virtually any time.
title: Close to the airport highway

text: 2018年8月のジャカルタでのアジア大会観戦のために宿泊しました。ホテルからメインの会場となったGBKまではGrabで22000ルピアの距離でした。宿泊した部屋はシャワー・トイレと洗面台が別になっている他、寝室とシャワーの間はガラス張りになっていました。（ブラインドを下ろすことができるので、視界を遮ることはできます。）朝食はブッフェ形式でしたが、2泊して2回とも肉類が1種類しかありませんでした。（1日はソーセージ、もう1日は鶏肉のグリル）それ以外は特に問題もなく、シャワーは常にお湯が出て、部屋も静かでよく眠れました。
title: ちょっと変わった中規模の中流ホテル
